trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <c>FormRegionInitializing</c> event of the form region factory class.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关表单区域工厂类的 <c>FormRegionInitializing</c> 事件的数据。

trans-unit.source: When you add an **Outlook Form Region** item to an Outlook add-in project, Visual Studio adds a form region factory class to the project that implements the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegionFactory> interface.
trans-unit.target: 当你将添加**Outlook 窗体区域**项向 Outlook 外接程序项目，Visual Studio 将窗体区域工厂类添加到实现的项目<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegionFactory>接口。

trans-unit.source: As part of this class, Visual Studio declares an event named `FormRegionInitializing`.
trans-unit.target: 作为此类的一部分，Visual Studio 声明名为事件`FormRegionInitializing`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the form region should appear for the current Outlook item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应为当前的 Outlook 项显示表单区域。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that indicates whether the form region should appear for the current Outlook item.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> ，该值指示窗体区域是否应显示为当前的 Outlook 项。

trans-unit.source: Gets the mode of the Microsoft Office Outlook item that caused the form region to load.
trans-unit.target: 获取导致表单区域加载的 Microsoft Office Outlook 项的模式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlFormRegionMode" /> that represents the mode of the Outlook item that caused the form region to load.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlFormRegionMode" /> ，表示导致要加载的窗体区域的 Outlook 项的模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of form region that loads.
trans-unit.target: 获取加载的表单区域的类型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlFormRegionSize" /> that represents the type of form region that loads.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlFormRegionSize" />表示加载的窗体区域的类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Microsoft Office Outlook item that caused the form region to load.
trans-unit.target: 获取导致表单区域加载的 Microsoft Office Outlook 项。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the Outlook item that caused the form region to load.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" /> ，表示导致要加载的窗体区域的 Outlook 项。

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly cast this object.
trans-unit.target: 此对象，你必须显式强制转换。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you know that the Outlook item is a contact item, cast the object returned by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionInitializingEventArgs.OutlookItem%2A> property to a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.ContactItem>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你知道的 Outlook 项是联系人项目，将对象强制转换返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionInitializingEventArgs.OutlookItem%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.ContactItem>。
